attributes.action: Include the Working Class in the £650 Cost of Living Payout
attributes.additional_details: The working class are struggling to afford to pay for fuel to get to work, cover household bill payments each month especially for gas and electric and food shops due to the drastic increase in the cost of living and minimal increase in minimum wage
attributes.background: Working class who earn under a government agreed amount per annum to be included in the cost of living payout

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see more people receive the £650 cost of living payment, but it's not clear exactly who else you want to receive this payment, as there is no set definition of 'the Working Class'.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition calling for this payment to be extended to individuals or households earning below a certain amount.
